last_episode_to_air.name: Howlin' Cousins
last_episode_to_air.overview: Scott visits his cousin, Todd, but the two have nothing in common. As Scott tries to help Todd come out of his shell, he realizes that he and his cousin are much more alike than he initially thought.

name: Teen Wolf
overview: Teen Wolf, known as The Cartoon Adventures of Teen Wolf in the United Kingdom, is an animated American television series broadcast from 1986 to 1987 that was produced by Southern Star Productions in association with Clubhouse Pictures. It was based on the 1985 live-action film, Teen Wolf.

episodes.name: Teen Wolf's Family Secret
episodes.overview: The grandmother of Scott finds the old family album, like Scott his ancestors also had the ability to turn into werewolf every full moon.

episodes.name: Grandpa's in the Doghouse
episodes.overview: After a transformation Grandpa Howard ends chasing up Ballard the cat from the next door neighbor around the whole neighborhood, and then Conroy the dog keeper finds Grandpa Howard frolicking around and mistakes Grandpa for a stray dog and puts him in the doghouse.

episodes.name: The Werewolf Buster
episodes.overview: A werewolf hunter comes to the town of Wolverton and Scott and his family must find and warn Grandpa who is hunting turkey in the woods before the werewolf hunter catches up.

episodes.name: Shopworn Wolf
episodes.overview: Stiles turns the Howard Hardware Store into a club while Scott's father is out of town.

episodes.name: The Beast Within
episodes.overview: The Howard family starts acting crazy and more feral than usual among turning into werewolves, and the cause is eventually linked to Lupe's science project.

episodes.name: Up a Family Tree
episodes.overview: Scott's family reunion is happening and his cousin almost reveals the family secret.

episodes.name: Wolf Pride
episodes.overview: Scott is offended by a werewolf horror movie being produced right in Wolverton, and wants to try and change the plot so it's more true to real life.

episodes.name: Wolf of My Dreams
episodes.overview: Scott finds that his sister Lupe is fanatic of a popular TV show named "Shayna, the She-Wolf", Scott at first is reluctant to watch the TV show but after some time watching Shayna by himself, he develops a crush on the TV star thinking she is a werewolf too, later Scott decides to write a letter to Shayna but for his surprise Shayna replies back, and ruled by his hormones Scott goes to Hollywood to search for his platonic love.

episodes.name: Leader of the Pack
episodes.overview: Stiles recommends the "Wolf pack" to be the entertainers for the Wolverton Festival. However, this bike gang brings big trouble and Scott must find a way to scare them out of town.

episodes.name: The Curse of the Red Paw
episodes.overview: Scott and his family make a trip to Rottenberg, Transylvania to reconnect with their past. However, danger lurks when the townspeople seem very spooked by the castle the family inherited. After a series of frightening instances, the family realizes there is nothing to be frightened about.

episodes.name: The All-American Werewolf
episodes.overview: Scott is surprised that his family was selected for a television contest named "The All American Family" Can Scott and his family keep their secret in front of national television?

episodes.name: Under My Spell
episodes.overview: A new family moves in that turns everyone in Wolverton except the Howards into zombies.

episodes.name: Teen Wolf Punks Out
episodes.overview: Stile's car breaks down and a group of punks offer to help.

episodes.name: Teen Wolf's Curse
episodes.overview: Grandma’s old enemy Zazu comes to town, vowing to take revenge on Grandma because she conquest Grandpa’s heart. For the revenge, Zazu puts a curse on Scott, that everyone who he touch will turn into a werewolf, is up to Scott, Stiles and Grandma to find Zazu so she can break the curse.

episodes.name: It's No Picnic Being Teen Wolf
episodes.overview: Scott has to watch over Grandpa for the weekend while Grandma is out of town, but it's the same weekend as the school picnic. Grandpa tags along with Scott and his friends, leaving Scott embarrassed in spite of Grandpa being able to keep up with the other teens. During a three legged race, Scott wolfs out and flees, leaving it up to Grandpa to find him.

episodes.name: Toot Toot Tut Tut and All That Rot
episodes.overview: The werewolf mascot costume is stolen by the uppity Upson High boys, right before the big game. Scott and Stiles must outsmart the snobbish Upson boys in order to retrieve the costume, or they'll have to find a new mascot entirely.

episodes.name: Down on the Farm
episodes.overview: Scott and his family must quickly figure out how to calm down the animals on a farm in order to effectively perform the daily chores.

episodes.name: Diary of a Mad Werewolf
episodes.overview: The statue of the "Werewolf on Horseback" is stolen with the diary of Scott's great Uncle, one of the town founders, hidden in it.

episodes.name: Teen Wolf Come Home
episodes.overview: Scott bumps his head and can't remember who is or that he is a werewolf.

episodes.name: Scott and the Howlers
episodes.overview: After Scott and his rock band perform a song on a televised talent show, Scott is discovered by a record label that wants to sign him. However, after realizing that the record label wants him to leave his friends behind, he must weigh the value of fame versus friends.

episodes.name: Howlin' Cousins
episodes.overview: Scott visits his cousin, Todd, but the two have nothing in common. As Scott tries to help Todd come out of his shell, he realizes that he and his cousin are much more alike than he initially thought.
